title: Baby Carrier
description: three hand stitched black panels bound in red; two rectangular embroidered sections with geometric designs in shades of tan; two other sections embroidered with floral designs in shades of tan; long center panel with geometric embroidery in shades of tan surrounded by 1 1/2\" embroidered bands; black lining, top open
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
